name: Hardest Rod Stewart Lyrics Trivia Quiz | Music | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which song of Rod's includes the line 'Four and twenty blackbirds in a cake and bake them all in a pie'?
questions.explanation:
Handbags and Gladrags.

	'Handbags and Gladrags' appeared on Rod's debut solo album "An Old Raincoat Won't Ever Let You Down" in 1969 and was covered by the Stereophonics in 2001.

questions.text:
'When the weather's better and the rails unfreeze
and the wind don't whistle 'round my knees' is a line from which Rod Stewart song?
questions.explanation:
Gasoline Alley.

	'Gasoline Alley' is the title song from Rod's second solo album released in 1970.

questions.text: Which Rod Stewart song features the following lyrics? 'The morning sun when it's in your face really shows your age'.
questions.explanation:
Maggie May.

	'Maggie May' was a number one hit in the UK in October 1971.

questions.text: 'Don't have much but what I've got is yours except of course my steel guitar' is a line from which Rod Stewart song?
questions.explanation:
Mandolin Wind.

	'Mandolin Wind' is a song from Rod's third solo album, "Every Picture Tells a Story".

questions.text: 'I am flying, passing high clouds, to be with you, to be free' comes from which massive hit single of Rod's?
questions.explanation:
Sailing.

	'Sailing' spent four weeks at number one in the UK charts in September 1975.

questions.text: Which Rod Stewart song contains the line 'Out of a darkened side street came a New Jersey gang with just one aim'?
questions.explanation:
The Killing Of Georgie.

	This song featured on the 1976 album "A Night on the Town".

questions.text:
'You're Celtic, United, but baby I've decided
You're the best team I've ever seen' is a line from which Rod Stewart song?
options: The First Cut is the Deepest
questions.explanation:
You're In My Heart.

	Rod pays tribute to his two favourite soccer clubs, Celtic and Manchester United, in this 1977 song.

questions.text: 'Patti packed her bags, left a note for her momma, she was just seventeen' is a line from which song of Rod's?
questions.explanation:
Young Turks.

	'Young Turks' comes from the 1981 album "Tonight I'm Yours".

questions.text: 'You and I were so close in every way don't time fly when you're loving and laughing' is a line from which Rod Stewart song?
questions.explanation:
Baby Jane.

	'Baby Jane' was a UK number one hit for rod in 1983.

questions.text: And finally, which Rod Stewart song do the following lyrics come from? 'And we'll drink a toast To the blood red rose Cheer a while the Emerald Isle'
questions.explanation:
Every Beat of My Heart.

	'Every Beat of My Heart' is the title song from the 1986 album.
